main event: On January 25, 1953, several military control tower operators in Albany, Georgia observed an unidentified flying object traveling at high speed, changing direction sharply and disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright orange-red light traveling at a high rate of speed,The witnesses included four officers, two of whom were trained pilots,The sighting lasted approximately 5-10 seconds and was made in clear weather conditions,Radar detected the object briefly before it disappeared, The object was determined to be larger and brighter than an average aircraft light and made no sound.
witness description: military officers, two of whom were trained pilots
